company_name.description: The official name of the company.

description.description: A brief description of the company, its mission, and key offerings.

website.description: The official website URL of the company.

poc_url.description: URL of the company's proof of concept or main service page.

email.description: The primary contact email of the company.

main_business.description: List of main business areas or industries the company operates in.

index_url.description: The main index page URL of the company (alternative to website).

phone_number.description: Primary contact phone number of the company.

address.description: The physical address of the company.

founded_year.description: The year the company was founded.

number_of_employees.description: The total number of employees working in the company.

country.description: The country where the company is headquartered.

social_media.description: A collection of social media profile URLs.
